resources.string: Welcome, freshman. I am your guide. Today I will lead you to experience a day as an ECS MSc student.
Now, press the button below to start our journey!

Hi, freshman! Let\'s go to the Interchange first. Interchange is the transportation center of Southampton University. Almost all UniLink buses stop here. These buses will take you to any place in Southampton.
Now we are arriving at the University Interchange. Remember, you can use your unlink card to take the bus of any route start with U. And the routes end with C are usually go to the city centre.
OK, let\'s go to the Building 53 to see your mentor, who is usually a PhD student and will help you in the future.

Great, we are in Building 53 now. It is also called Mountbatten Building which is named after a school leader of ECS. Freshman, I think you have to attend your Software Modelling class now! Go to the building 58 now! It is just near the Building 53!

Hum, we are just on time! Listen, Building 58 is also called Murray Building, it is where Mathematics School located in. As a ECS student, sometimes you have lectures in the building belongs to another school.

Hey, it is 12 o\'clock now, let\'s go to have lunch! And your tutor is waiting you in the Library. What's more don't forget to go to the SUSU shop to buy some notebooks. Where do you want to go first?

string-array.item: Great! Let's go to the piazza restaurant to enjoy half chicken meal! It's in Building 42, I will lead you there!
OK! Go to the Hartley Library it's building 36. And you may need to cross the road. Be careful to watch the traffic lights when crossing the road.
SUSU shop is a good choice to save money! It's in Building 57ï¼ŒLet's go!.
Here we are at restaurant, you can enjoy any food you like here! Let's just finish the lunch and go to the next point!
Go! your tutor is sitting in the cafe! See you later! And let's go to the next point!
Here we are in SUSU shop! I think you can have a job here if you want to work in the university. OK, let's go to the next point!
Do you know you will have a MSc project this year? Go to the Building 32 to meet your supervisor Dave in room 3031!

I think you can do well in your MSc project! However, if you want to do your project well, I think you can start learning from now! Now, let's do it! You can just go to the building 16 nearby, it is the ECS lab for MSc students, you can also go to the hartley library. Or you can go to the Zepler Building Lab. It is just near the Mountbatten Building! So which do you prefer?
Finished? Come on! If you don't like it, we can go to another place!
Great! You work so hard! Let's go to the Jubilee Sports Centre to have fun. It's Building 18, just near the SUSU Shop!
Here we are at Jubilee Sports Hall! You can see the swimming pool, and there is also a gym and indoor basketball court.
That's all about today, freshman! Go to the interchange and catch a bus, see you tomorrow!
